item.title: Projects
item.description: Introduction Hi there!, My name is Nirjhar. An amature physics lover to be precise.This is my blog website, where I will post about my recent projects and works.I’m tagging here my recent project , which is a website made for to help new olympiadians also help who are not new to this, yet need some resources. This website contains questions from other countries physics olympiads , also I had put some pdfs of some physics books, which will help those who are going to participate phy olympiad.
